about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a frontend developer who enjoys turning complex ideas into clean, interactive user experiences. With a strong foundation in modern web technologies, I focus on building responsive, accessible, and maintainable interfaces that feel intuitive to use.
about.experience: While I understand the full stack, my passion lies in crafting the visual and interactive parts of the web. I’m always exploring new tools, frameworks, and best practices to keep improving and to create thoughtful, high-performing applications. If you have a project in mind or just want to connect - don’t hesitate to reach out.

next.name: Portfolio
next.fullDescription: A fast, server-side rendered developer portfolio using Next.js, with multilingual support, responsive UI, and built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

movies.name: Search Movies Service
movies.fullDescription: A full-stack React and Express web app for searching, filtering, and saving movies (BeatFilm API), with JWT-based authentication, MongoDB database, deployed via Docker and automated with GitHub Actions.

mesto.name: Pics Exchange Service
mesto.fullDescription: A full-stack photo-sharing social network app with React frontend and Express backend, featuring JWT authentication, logging, and CORS, with automated deployment using Docker and GitHub Actions.

todolist.name: Todolist
todolist.fullDescription: A task management app with a React + TypeScript frontend and an Express.js + MongoDB backend, containerized with Docker and deployed automatically via GitHub Actions.

drummachine.name: Drum Machine
drummachine.fullDescription: An MVP of a drum synthesizer and sequencer inspired by the Roland TR-909, built with React for creating and programming electronic drum patterns.

express.name: API for Pics Exchange Service
express.fullDescription: This is a Node.js backend for a photo-sharing social network, built with Express and MongoDB. It handles user authentication via JWT, profile updates, card management (add/delete, like/dislike), custom error handling, and request validation with Joi.

game.name: Shoot The Expert Game
game.fullDescription: Shoot The Expert is a simple SPA game built with React, designed as an engaging landing page element.

javascript.name: Pics Exchange Service
javascript.fullDescription: This is a social network frontend built with plain JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. It allows users to update their profile info and avatar, add/delete posts with custom validation, like or dislike posts, and enlarge images in a popup. The app communicates with the backend via REST API and is optimized for both desktop and mobile browsers.

warTimer.name: War Timer
warTimer.fullDescription: War Timer is a simple app that counts the time passed since the war in Ukraine started. It uses third-party APIs for user geo-location and sunrise/sunset times to toggle dark/light themes, built with vanilla JavaScript and REST APIs.

gridFlex.name: Little Fat Boy
gridFlex.fullDescription: Little Fat Boy is a food blog’s main page featuring several blocks including Header and Navigation, with adaptive design using Flexbox and a “This Week” section built with CSS Grid. The layout follows Nested-BEM, Mobile-first, and Adaptive-design principles.

adaptive.name: Project Travel
adaptive.fullDescription: PROJECT TRAVEL - one-page responsive website dedicated to traveling, featuring adaptive design with CSS Grid, built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Nested-BEM, Mobile-first, and Adaptive-design principles.

storyBook.name: Charts
storyBook.fullDescription: A TypeScript-based React component library for interactive charts built with VISX, featuring line, radar, and bar charts - documented in Storybook and designed for internal use.
